message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,500,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,200,000. This is my final offer.
